thread.section_title: pentahotel Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel, pretty design
thread.title_full: Great hotel, pretty design - Review of pentahotel Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Saraa A
title: Great hotel, pretty design
text:
Stayed in Penta hotel for 3 days on a shopping trip to Beijing and absolutely loved the place- the rooms are clean, spacious and well designed, the hotel lobby, bar and coffee shop are stylish and the service is fast. The hotel staff are also friendly and have decent english knowledge- enough to get you comfortable service.
Only downside was the room being a bit cold and the outside noise seeping in through the window- tightening the window or bringing in the heater didn't do much.
Overall i loved my stay and i'd definetely come back here again.
